name: SUPERJUMP
description:
Have you ever wondered what would it be like to combine roguelike, first-person shooter, and parkour in a single game? As a team of four people, we developed SUPERJUMP, an infnintely generating maze with an unknown purpose, where you, the player, must uncover the secrets hidden within.

Controlling a robot, you use a grappler together with weapons to aid your movement. The center of the maze is the finish line, while other robots are trying to stop you from getting closer.

Every run has you going through procedurally generated levels, using rooms as material. You find yourself in a different place each time you start over, but keep the knowledge from your previous attempts.

The more times you reach the end, the more parts of the story you get to read. The purposes of this organization are unknown, but some may say it has to stay that way...
